definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
see 大旱望雲霓|大旱望云霓[da4 han4 wang4 yun2 ni2]
pinyin: da4 han4 zhi1 wang4 yun2 ni2

definition: lit. looking for rain clouds in times of drought (idiom)/fig. desperate for an escape from a difficult situation
see 大旱望雲霓|大旱望云霓[da4 han4 wang4 yun2 ni2]
(slang) Japan (loanword from the Japanese word for Japan, "Nihon")
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]

sentences.english: The first time in my life I saw a complete half-circle rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 第一次看到了傳說中的霓和虹同時懸掛在天空的奇景。

sentences.english: Compared with Ugni Blanc white wine, Ecolly white wine has typical characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 與對照白玉霓白葡萄酒相比，香氣具有一定的典型性。

sentences.english: Whos Who of the Ni silence away.
sentences.chinese: 誰的沉默帶走了誰的霓。

sentences.english: According to the monitoring data, the settlement regularities of the existing Lingni seawall were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 本文結合監測資料，分析了現靈霓海堤的沉降規律。

definition: umber-black dye for painting the eyebrow
(phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
Anaphalis yedoensis (pearly everlasting reed)/used in Japanese names with phonetic value Ogi
